entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
